item.title: Exploratory Data Analysis: Game of Thrones Characters
item.description: Introduction In this study, Iâ€™ve applied some basic data manipulation and statistical methods to one of my favorite works of fiction, the Game of Thrones series by George R.R. Martin! In particular, I wanted to differentiate between the influence of characters between the books compared to the show, seeing as how the two stories have greatly diverged. I also wanted to see which characters were the most influential overall.
